$schema.description: The JSON schema for this slice

version.title: Impex Provider content version
version.description: Version will be used by Impex to know what data format to expect

type.title: Impex slice type
type.description: Value will be used by Impex to know the content type of the slice

tag.title: Impex slice tag
tag.description: The Impex slice tag contains information about the responsible Impex provider for this slice

meta.title: Metadata for the slice
meta.description: Metadata is a JSON object used to store additional information about the slice

data.title: Data portion of this Impex slice
data.description:
Attachment slice data is expected to be a URI to the attachment file.
For media it has to be the URI to the image.
URI can be absolute or relative.
